parameters.name: StackRefactorId
parameters.description: The ID associated with the stack refactor created from the  CreateStackRefactor action.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description to help you identify the refactor.

nested_items.name: StackRefactorId
nested_items.description: The ID associated with the stack refactor created from the  CreateStackRefactor action.

nested_items.name: StackIds
nested_items.description: The unique ID for each stack.

nested_items.name: ExecutionStatus
nested_items.description: The stack refactor execution operation status that's provided after calling the  ExecuteStackRefactor action.

nested_items.name: ExecutionStatusReason
nested_items.description: A detailed explanation for the stack refactor ExecutionStatus.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The stack refactor operation status that's provided after calling the  CreateStackRefactor action.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
